traits.name: Astral Fire
traits.description: You know one of the following cantrips: Dancing Lights, Light, or Sacred Flame. Choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as your spellcasting ability for it.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the charmed condition on yourself.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Starlight Step
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining all expended uses on a long rest.

traits.name: Astral Trance
traits.description: You don’t need to sleep, and magic can’t put you to sleep. You can finish a long rest in 4 hours if you spend them in meditation.

traits.name: Astral Memory
traits.description: When you finish a long rest, choose one skill proficiency and one weapon or tool proficiency from the Player’s Handbook. You retain these proficiencies until your next long rest.

options: Any language you and your DM agree is appropriate
